name: Hyperspace Hovercraft
description:
Obstacles will fall from the top of the screen and push you under the bottom. You move your ship by tapping the sides of the screen, but the ship will drift to the center. 

But there is a twist! The closer to the bottom of the screen you are, the more points you earn! BUT THERE IS ANOTHER TWIST, the closer to the bottom of the screen you are, the more obstacles spawn!
